headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Afraid of showing up to the Car Meet in a rust bucket? Spice up your collection by adding a Vapid Dominator GTT for 30% off, as well as 40% off a selection of vehicles. Meanwhile, all Bunkers are half off, while their Upgrades are on sale for 40% off for the next week.

- Vapid Dominator GTT – 30% off
- Bravado Half-Track – 40% off
- Dewbauchee Specter – 30% off
- All Bunkers – 50% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
